author: Theresa Avila
title: Serena Williams Happily Flashes Her Engagement Ring While Out With Fiancé Alexis Ohanian In an On-Brand Photo
text: After surprising the world last week with news of her engagement to Alexis Ohanian , the co-founder of Reddit, Serena Williams has been teasing her fans about what her engagement ring looks like without actually revealing, well, what it looks like. Now, though, we have the first More »
